column1: Dhamnod is a town and a nagar parishad in Dhar district in the state of Madhya Pradesh

column2: Dhamnod had a population of about 50
column3: 000. Males constitute 52% of the population and females 48%. Dhamnod has an average literacy rate of 60%
column4: higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 68% and
column6: 15% of the population is under 6 years of age.
